mapper.insert: insert into order_tb (order_id, user_id, name, amount, platform) values (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{cashAmount}, #{platform})
mapper.select: select * from order_tb where user_id = #{userId} and order_id = #{orderId} and amount = #{totalAmount}
mapper.delete: delete order_table where order_id = #{orderId} and tid = #{tid} and user_id = #{userId}
